An unfilled blank expense reimbursement form template with Don's name and address pre-printed but no actual data entered; a bureaucratic form with no substantive content.

The full text reproduces the Conference Board of Canada's 'Employability Skills 2000+' framework verbatim, which is not Don's writing. While Don clearly used this framework in his Education 20/20 work, the document itself is external reference material rather than Don's personal writing.
